description.value:
Master Crafted Relic Reliquary of the Sons of Medusa Chapter. Bearer adds twice their Willpower Bonus to all Toughness Tests. Can also spend a Fate Point to ignore Stunning, Fatigue, and Critical Effects (excluding limb loss and death) for 1d5 Rounds.

Effect: Famed

Notes: 30 R
